content.rendered:
COVID-19 provided yet another detour on the path toward workforce equity and inclusion. Handshake Network Trends’ first report, “Gender, Equity, and Gen Z,” analyzes product usage and survey results from over 1,000 college student job seekers to determine the most sought after characteristics of employers when it comes to hiring the most diverse generation yet.

Download the infographic

Check out the full report for more gender diversity insights from Handshake’s student network.

excerpt.rendered: Gen Z’s Role in an Equitable Workforce
